channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Tivoli Netcool/OMNIbus
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Tivoli Netcool/OMNIbus

item.title: CVE-2021-29805|2024-09-16T20:51:38.251Z -- ibm -- tivoli%20netcool%2Fomnibus
item.description: IBM Tivoli Netcool/OMNIbus_GUI 8.1.0 is vulnerable to stored cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 204263.

item.title: CVE-2021-29808|2024-09-16T16:28:33.943Z -- ibm -- tivoli%20netcool%2Fomnibus
